name: Cult Dystopia
description:
Controls 

A & D - Move Left & Right

Space - Jump

Space (Double tap) - Activate Jet Boots

Left Mouse - Shoot

You play as a robotic Charles Manson in the future in Hell and destroy Music notes to gain followers that you will have to sacrifice for your life at some point. 

Credits

Programmers

Samuel Arminana

Kaitlin Long

Artists

Willie MacFarlane
